    • Constructor Detail

      • AdvertisementImpl

        public AdvertisementImpl(int advertId,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Role> roles,
                 Employer employer,
                 java.lang.String applicationDetails,
                 java.lang.String comments,
                 Advertisement.AdvertisementStatus status)
        Creates instance of an advertisement.
        Parameters:
        advertId - Identifier for the advert
        roles - Roles that the advertisement is looking for
        employer - Employer that posted the advert
        applicationDetails - Further details about application
        comments - Course coordinators comments on the advert
        status - status of advert, whether it is pending etc
